alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Suffolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 19 at 2:34PM EST until January 20 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO NOON EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (10.6 to 12.4 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Eastern Essex MA, Suffolk MA, Eastern Norfolk MA and Eastern Plymouth MA Counties. * WHEN...From 5 AM to noon EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Splashover and very minor coastal flooding of lots, parks, and roads within a few hours on either side of high tide. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Gloucester Harbor MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 13.0 ft, Major 15.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.0 ft, Moderate 3.5 ft, Major 5.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 19/09 PM 9.2/ 9.7 -0.3/ 0.2 0.6/ 1.1 2-3 None 20/09 AM 11.8/12.3 2.2/ 2.7 1.2/ 1.7 5-6 Minor 20/10 PM 10.2/10.7 0.7/ 1.1 1.2/ 1.7 6-7 None 21/10 AM 11.9/12.4 2.3/ 2.8 0.9/ 1.4 4-5 Minor 21/11 PM 10.0/10.5 0.5/ 1.0 0.7/ 1.1 2-3 None 22/11 AM 11.7/12.2 2.2/ 2.7 0.4/ 0.9 2 Minor Merrimack River near Newburyport MA MLLW Categories - info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Suffolk
